channel.title: Rock the world (B side)
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Rock the world (B side)" - i have 21 emo rock cd's but cant pass the mission

item.title: Re: Rock the world (B side)
item.content:encoded: There is no auto-pass jutsu for any part of either of the Rock the World Missions. You have to just beat them normally.

item.title: Re: Rock the world (B side)
item.content:encoded:
the genjutsu emo lv.2 mission said that must use mind control. is that mind switch control body ?? i used it but still not pass. is that any othger jutsu 4 to use ?

tq

item.title: Re: Rock the world (B side)
item.content:encoded: ah alright, i though with the special missions as long as you had the requirement's you didnt need much to beat them

item.title: Re: Rock the world (B side)
item.content:encoded: The CDs don't help with the Genjutsu challenge. You need to be able to beat the challenges to pass the mission. Stack your team as strong as possible, and use the best jutsu you can get your hands on.

item.title: Rock the world (B side)
item.content:encoded: i have 21 emo rock cds but when i try the rock the world, b side mission icant even get past the first genjutsu part. Am i saposed to have 30 cds? or am i surposed to have emosuke in my team when i do the mission?
